General.Name: Shin Shin Natural Gas Co Ltd
General.Description: Shin Shin Natural Gas Company Limited supplies natural gas in Taiwan. The company also engages in the manufacture, sale, import, and export of gas equipment; and planning and supervision of gas equipment and construction. It serves general and commercial customers. The company was founded in 1971 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 100, Section 1, New Taipei City, Taiwan

6.Name: Mr. Huai-An  Liao
6.Title: Head of Labor Safety and Health Office
